entities.name: light
entities.description: The light is described as something that 'soared downward' and 'fixed itself upon Wormtail's bleeding wrist'. It is also mentioned that it is attached to Wormtail's arm 'seamlessly', like a glove.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: Wormtail is described as someone who is sobbing and then stops abruptly. He is also shown to be in disbelief at the silver hand attached to his arm.

entities.name: volde-mort
entities.description: Volde-mort is mentioned as the one whose robes Wormtail kisses. He is referred to as 'My Lord' and 'Master' by Wormtail.

relationships.description: The light is attached to Wormtail's arm, described as a seamless attachment.
Wormtail kisses the hem of Volde-mort's robes.
